pr_title: SONARJAVA-3547 Improve rule S1612 to replace casts with method reference

timeline.message: SONARJAVA-3547 Improve rule S1612 to replace casts with method reference

timeline.author: m-g-sonar

timeline.bodyText: I feel this check defeats a bit the purpose of using ExpressionUtils.skipParentheses(...);, Won't it be possible to already arrive here which a (Nullable) ExpressionTree instead? It would make things easier.
timeline.author: m-g-sonar

timeline.bodyText: The only reason of keeping the lambda as 2nd parameter is to ultimately check for the parameter symbol (3 calls below). Wouldn't it be possible to check this earlier (only one param for instance) and only pass a symbol?
timeline.author: m-g-sonar

timeline.bodyText: This change does not seem required to me, you kept it in the other file.
timeline.author: m-g-sonar
